evolve::CommonAspect

evolve::CommonAspect Class Reference

#include <CommonAspect.h>

Inheritance diagram for evolve::CommonAspect:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Various aspects of evolve objects that cut across all objects.

Root of object hierachy.

bool getLogger (Logger *&logger, bool printDebug=DO_DEBUG)
 Returns a pointer at this logger object Note that if you pass it a non-null pointer, it will attempt to delete it, if it doesn't point at allocated memory, this will make it seg fault.

bool CommonAspect::getNotify ( bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG  ) 

bool CommonAspect::getLogger ( Logger *&  logger,
bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG 
)

Returns a pointer at this logger object Note that if you pass it a non-null pointer, it will attempt to delete it, if it doesn't point at allocated memory, this will make it seg fault.

Haven't decided if this is good or bad behavior (it does encourage one to intialize their pointers!)
